sentence.Network_en: The encouragement of a friend spurred Chris into switching jobs.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一位朋友的鼓励下，克理斯换了工作。

sentence.Network_en: The man was crooning soft words of encouragement to his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个男人正温柔地轻声鼓励他的妻子。

sentence.Network_en: I also had friends who gave me a great deal of encouragement.
sentence.Network_cn: 我还有些朋友给了我很多鼓励。

entry.def: Encouragement is the activity of encouraging someone, or something that is said or done in order to encourage them.

example.ex: I also had friends who gave me a great deal of encouragement...
example.tran: 我还有些朋友给了我很多鼓励。

example.ex: Thanks for your advice and encouragement.

means.word_mean: 1. the expression of approval and support
2. the act of giving hope or support to someone

auth_sentence.content: Your encouragement means the world to Elin and me.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your encouragement means the world to Elin and me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your encouragement means the world to Elin and me.

auth_sentence.content: We welcome Lord Carter's encouragement of these discussions.
auth_sentence.res_content: We welcome Lord Carter's encouragement of these discussions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We welcome Lord Carter's encouragement of these discussions.

auth_sentence.content: Leon sensed another factor behind the neurosurgeon's encouragement.
auth_sentence.res_content: Leon sensed another factor behind the neurosurgeon's encouragement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Leon sensed another factor behind the neurosurgeon's encouragement.

means.word_mean: 鼓励;支持(的事物);激励;促进(的事物);起激励作用的事物

sentences.en: Getting the support of the Queen was a great encouragement to those involved in the project.
sentences.cn: 对这项工程的参与者来说，女王的支持是莫大的鼓舞。

sentences.en: He assisted me with good counsel and encouragement.
sentences.cn: 他以良好的忠告和鼓励帮助我

sentences.en: Her encouragement and support strengthened our resolve.
sentences.cn: 她的鼓励和支持加强了我们的决心。

sentences.en: His words of encouragement were to no avail.
sentences.cn: 他的那些鼓励的话丝毫没有作用。

sentences.en: I could never have achieved this without the encouragement of my husband and family.
sentences.cn: 如果没有我的丈夫和家人的鼓励,我决不可能赢得这个成绩。
